title: e-Tax Registration Process
original_text: etrax.mor.gov.et ላይ ለኢ-ትክስ መለያ ይመዝግቡ. በ'አዲስ ተጠቃሚ ምዝገባ' ላይ ይጫኑ.
translated_text: Register for e-Tax account at etrax.mor.gov.et. Click on 'New User Registration'.

question.en: What documents are required for registration?

answer.en: You need a valid ID and business registration certificate.
answer.am: እርስዎ ልክ የተሰጠ መለያ እና የቢዝነስ ምዝገባ ማረጋገጫ ያስፈልግዎታል።

description.en: A business successfully registered for e-Tax services.
description.am: ቢዝነስ ለኢ-ትክስ አገልግሎቶች በተሳካ ሁኔታ ተመዝግቧል።
